title: Pogback to Juventus
description:
Pogba is back to Juventus, again on a free transfer. Juve, however, are still active in the transfer market. Gabriel Jesus debuts and already gets on the score sheet for Arsenal. Is that a sign of things to come? And two epic matches in the Women's Euro end in draws. Portugal rallies back to rescue a point versus Sweden, while favorites Sweden and Netherlands show why they're the teams to beat in the group.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Pogba officially returns to Juventus. Gabriel Jesus starts off on the right foot with Arsenal. Group C is gridlocked in the Women's Euro.
